data.title: Arun and I separated few months ago: Liz Hurley
data.meta_description: British actress Liz Hurley and her Indian origin husband Arun Nayar have separated, the former has confirmed on micro blogging site Twitter.
data.text:
British actress Liz Hurley and her Indian origin husband Arun Nayar have separated, the former has confirmed on micro blogging site Twitter.

"Not a great day," Hurley told her followers on Twitter on the day a British newspaper reported she has been having an affair with the former Australian cricketer Shane Warne.

"For the record, my husband Arun and I separated a few months ago. Our close family and friends were aware of this," she tweeted.

The 45-year-old actress has been married to the tycoon of Indian origin since 2007.

The Aussie spin legend has been accused of having an affair with Hurley. News reports of a steamy affair surfaced when they were caught on camera in a successive passionate public embraces in London.

British tabloid the News of the World claimed that Hurley spent two nights with Warne in his London hotel suite this week. The report says the pair was also captured on video embracing and kissing outside a restaurant.

The paper said the pair was seen exchanging kisses after coming out of Warne's luxury suite in a hotel close to Hurley's London home. It was reported that on their second night together they were locked away in the same suite for more than 11 hours.

Warne and Hurley first met in July at a racing event in London. The duo has been exchanging flirty Twitter messages for months.
